text: My wife and I went to L capital for dinner last night and we had the Caesar salad with chicken and their special penne with chicken dinner along with the Malibu mass all was quite nice the staff was very friendly and we would definitely go back again

Visited for a Sunday evening dinner having turned up on a previous Saturday without a reservation and being told the restaurant was full - which I only mention as a good thing showing how popular the restaurant is.   There was a fixed price menu available but I went for the a la carte. I had arancini starter which was super tasty and a fabulous creamy pasta with spicy sausage main and was then too full for dessert. Staff were really friendly also.   Great addition to the local dining options and would definitely recommend.
